branchCategory.name: PFM
branchCategory.description: <p>Digital Flow Switch series 90-PFM7 is dual color digital&nbsp;and was developed initially to detect microchip component adsorption in vacuum, and early clogging in both filter and nozzle applications.&nbsp; The series is incredibly compact and lightweight compared to existing flow sensors.&nbsp;90-PFM7 is made from materials compatible with secondary battery manufacturing.</p>

branchItem.name: 90-PFM7, 2-Color Display, Digital Flow Switch, Integrated Display
branchItem.description: <p>Digital Flow Switch series 90-PFM7 is dual color digital&nbsp;and&nbsp;was developed initially to detect microchip component adsorption in vacuum, and early clogging in both filter and nozzle applications.&nbsp; The series is incredibly compact and lightweight compared to existing flow sensors.&nbsp;90-PFM7 is made from materials compatible with secondary battery manufacturing.</p>
